The first day of the workshop was spent discussing the themes of the exhibition and what it means to be an artist in the 21st century. The second day was spent on creating a piece of art that would be included in the exhibition.

The exhibition was held at The Centre for Contemporary Arts in Glasgow, Scotland from the 9th of November to the 14th of December 2013. The exhibition showcased a variety of artworks that were created by the artists during the workshop.

The exhibition was opened by Professor Paul Crowther from The University of Glasgow and included a performance by the band 'The Violets'.
